sn48.14:1.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
sn48.14:1.5: Someone who has completed and fulfilled these five faculties is a perfected one. If they are weaker than that, they’re a non-returner … a once-returner … a stream-enterer … a follower of the teachings … a follower by faith.
sn48.14:1.6: So, mendicants, if you practice partially you succeed partially. If you practice fully you succeed fully.
sn48.14:1.7: These five faculties are not a waste, I say.”
